```{r}

source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OHI-Science/ohiprep_v2019/gh-pages/workflow/R/common.R")

tmp <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OHI-Science/ohiprep_v2019/gh-pages/globalprep/prs_cw_pathogen/v2018/output/po_pathogen_popdensity25mi_gf.csv") %>%
  filter(year == 2015) %>%
  left_join(rgns_eez, by = "rgn_id") %>%
  filter(gapfill == 1) %>%
  filter(method != "uninhabited, perfect score") %>%
  select(rgn_name, rgn_id, method, territory, admin_country_name)


```
